description:
From our law office in River Edge, New Jersey, the top-rated, award-winning lawyers at the Atkins, Tafuri, Minassian, D'Amato & Beane, P.A., law firm provide unmatched representation to clients throughout Bergen, Passaic, Hudson, Essex and Morris counties and beyond who have legal needs involving any of the following:

  • Family law and divorce
  • Criminal defense and municipal court hearings
  • Real estate law and transactions
  • Land use and zoning
  • Wills, trusts and probate
  • Corporate and business law
  • Personal injury, medical malpractice and other tortious claims

Combined, our lawyers have more than 200 years of total legal experience, and our law firm has served the residents and businesses of New Jersey for over 40 years. No matter how complex your needs, you can rely on us to carefully discuss your options to help you make the best-informed decisions. We will remain by your side throughout all legal proceedings to increase your chances of obtaining the favorable outcomes you seek as efficiently and cost-effectively as possible.

Honored for our outstanding professionalism and service, our lawyers have earned AV Preeminent peer review rating* from Martindale-Hubbell along with many other top rankings and endorsements from our peers. Perhaps more importantly, we have also received numerous testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients, and our law firm has become one of New Jersey's premier full-service legal practices for individuals, families and business owners in need.

To find out more about how we can best assist you with your legal challenge, you can contact Atkins, Tafuri, Minassian, D'Amato & Beane, P.A., to schedule a consultation. Our law office also currently offers virtual consultations in these uncertain times to help keep you and your loved ones safe and healthy.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
